## Set up

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

## Load packages
library(here)
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
library(readxl)
library(freeR)

## Sets R not to use scientific notations
options(scipen=999) 

raw_data_path <- here::here("6.raw_data/")
```

## Exploring data
```{r}

excel_sheets(here::here("6.raw_data/SeedlingExclosures_Cooper.xlsx"))

```

2 sheets found. 
Data contains all necesary data
Key contains metadata info

## Read data
```{r}
seedling_raw <- read_excel(here::here("6.raw_data/SeedlingExclosures_Cooper.xlsx"), sheet = "Data") %>% 
  clean_names()
```

CHECK FOR WARNINGS!
